english.segment1: Lamp unto my feet. Light unto my path. It is You. Jesus, It is You
english.segment2: This treasure that I hold. More than finest gold. It is You. Jesus, It is You
english.segment3: With all my heart. With all my soul. I live to worship You. And praise forevermore. Praise forevermore
english.segment4: Lord everyday. I need You more. On wings of Heaven I will soar. With You
english.segment5: You take my broken ness. And call me to yourself. There You stand. Heal me in Your hand
